definition: the act of rowing as a sport, propel with oars
details:
noun
- the act of rowing as a sport
= synonyms: rowing
- (construction) a layer of masonry
= synonyms: course
- a continuous chronological succession without an interruption
= example: a continuous chronological succession without an interruption
- an angry dispute
= synonyms: quarrel, words, wrangle, run-in, dustup
- an arrangement of objects or people side by side in a line
= example: an arrangement of objects or people side by side in a line
- a linear array of numbers, letters, or symbols side by side
- a long continuous strip (usually running horizontally)
= example: a long continuous strip (usually running horizontally)
verb
- propel with oars
= example: propel with oars
